subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which battle marked the establishment of the Mewar Kingdom?
question_hi: मेयवार के प्रमुख बैठन ने मेयवार संतरां की संरक्षण के लिए क्या किया ?
explanation_en: The Battle of Chittorgarh took place in 1303, marking the establishment of the Mewar Kingdom under Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: 1303 में रानी कुम्भ ने मेयर संतरां क्षेत्र को संतरां के लिए निर्माण तिहाँ आयें।
explanation_en: The Battle of Chittorgarh took place in 1303, marking the establishment of the Mewar Kingdom under Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: 1303 में रांनी कुम्भ ने मेयर सांत्राणी को स्तराण लिए।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which festival is celebrated with great enthusiasm in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्तान के महिले में कौम्यांत्राण लिए।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahotsav is a festival celebrated in Rajasthan to welcome the arrival of spring.
explanation_hi: हवा महोसव फैस्त्राण में सप्ती वाला लें।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Mughal ruler to capture Jaipur?
explanation_en: Jai Singh I was the first Mughal ruler to capture Jaipur. He captured Jaipur in 1727 CE.
